description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 18/02203/LA3 dated 8th March 2019:- Amendments to window arrangements, including additional opening lights for natural ventilation- New stairs for Year 7 building project out from facade due to spatial contraints internally and provide fire lobbies- South elevation high level glazing amended to translucent polycarbonate cladding for glare and safety reasons- Glazing added to dance studio south elevation for views out- West elevation ventilation louvres added above windows for acoustic reasons- Brick in lieu of rain screen cladding at low level to east facade of changing block (accessible to students)- West elevation facade to dance and fitness studios rainscreen cladding in lieu of brick (not accessible to students)- Internal amendments to enlarge Dance and Fitness studio and re-arrange hall storage to suit school requirements- Amendments to the proposed materials and form of the entrance pavilion to work with proposed highways works to Boundary Lane- Amendments to the courtyard colonnade
